spec_data.Name: librpmem
spec_data.Description:
The librpmem library provides low-level support for remote access
to persistent memory utilizing RDMA-capable NICs. It can be used
to replicate peristent memory regions over RDMA protocol.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:35:04 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Remote Access to Persistent Memory library
